Description: We are hiring a Lifeguard for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 1-year experience in the hotel industry.
Swimming proficiency is a must.
Knowledge of on-site protocols, operational procedures, and safety policies.
Knowledge of methods and techniques for providing on-site emergency medical services.
A female candidate is required.
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
